hackathon-description-text: A 36 hour hackathon held hosted by TechHackers at Virginia Tech in Cassell Coliseum. This hacakthon seeks to bring creative and passionate minds together for one weekend to work on a project. The projects have no category restriction, so the hacker is free to experiment with anything. Attendees can work in teams of upto 4 and have the opportunity to showcase their hack at the end of the event.
hackathon-requirements: There is no category restriction at this hackathon, attendees are free to create whatever they wish!
hackathon-rules: All rules set by MLH including its Code of Conduct apply.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The Entrepreneur Club at Virginia Tech is giving away $250 to the hack that is most likely to turn into a startup.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: VT E-Club - Most Viable Product E-Club

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 Bitcoin - Program using internet sourced data.
You can win a free Raspberry Pi or an OpenWRT device if you can build something cool using a Raspberry Pi or OpenWRT device.

Prize: MacBook Pro. Description: Use Salesforce as a back end to fuel live data. Access data using any of the various Salesforce APIs. Bonus points will go to the app with a real world application and original business use case.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Salesforce as a Backend

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Solve a real world problem with your project. IBM goodies include: A sling backpack, mp3 speaker, 8gb thumb drive, rectangle phone charger, and an IBM key chain.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: IBM - Best Solution to Real World Problems

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This award goes out to the team that creates the best app that shows the value of low latency/high capacity fiber. What will you do with gig Internet?
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: TechPad - App That Show Value of Low Latency

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First place gets $250, second $100. Fitnet, fit.net, is a mobile fitness app. The app must include a scheduler and alerts. Most creative app which incorporates multiple motivators wins the prize.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Fitnet - App That Commits Users to Workout Days

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: CapTech will be giving away Chromecasts to each member of the team to create the most scale-able application.
You are busy building an amazing startup, new app, or world changing technology. It's what you love. Let our expects focus on your cloud infrastructure.  It's what we love. rackspacestartup.com

hackathon-description-header: A 36 hackathon that brings students from all over the country together to grow in passion, ability, and experience.
